channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SCOTUS Holds The Key To Stopping Virginia Democrats’ Gun Control Gambit. Will They Use It?
item.description: Two cases pending before SCOTUS give the justices the opportunity to stave off Virginia Democrats' seemingly unconstitutional gun control proposals.

item.title: Fire or impeachment: Democrats give Trump an ultimatum on DHS Secretary Noem
item.description: House Democratic leaders told President Trump Tuesday that if he won't fire Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, they will move to impeach her.

item.title: The Second Amendment Role Reversal
item.description: The truth is, legally, Alex Pretti was within his rights to have his gun on his person; but that doesn’t mean his actions were prudent.

item.title: Border Patrol shooting in Arizona leaves person in critical condition
item.description: A shooting early Tuesday involving the Border Patrol near the U.S.-Mexico border in Arizona left one person in critical condition.

item.title: Apply Health-Care Tariffs Evenly, or Not at All
item.description: Stronger trade policy begins with consistent treatment of essential medical products.

item.title: Minnesota’s Campaign for Interposition and Nullification
item.description: More than 200 years after the Kentucky Resolutions, a version of nullification still lives.

item.title: Like January 6, Minnesota Is a Test of American National Sovereignty
item.description: ICE tactics are the pretext; the real issue is whether states can make themselves no-go zones immune from federal law.

item.title: Trump's border wall sees slow start in second term
item.description: As he closed out his first term, President Trump was erecting his border wall at a rate faster than a mile a day, as he rushed to fulfill one of his m...

item.title: Trump Is Letting Tim Walz Beat Him In Minneapolis
item.description: There is no deal to be made with officials who reject the law itself. And there is no obligation for Trump to meet them halfway.

item.title: Reagan Airport air traffic controller 'overwhelmed' moments before midair collision
item.description: The air traffic controller managing flights at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport reported to a supervisor he was "overwhelmed" minutes before ...

item.title: Dems’ ‘Unconstitutional’ Bill Would Jail Law-Abiding Virginians For Guns They Already Own
item.description: Violators could face up to 12 months in prison and a restriction on ownership or possession of any and all firearms for three years.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Kill Scores Of Americans For Every Leftist Who Dies Protecting Them
item.description: Leftist radicals don't care about the innocent Americans whose lives were ripped away by criminal illegal aliens.

item.title: 5 questions about the St. Paul church disruption
item.description: Approximately 40 agitators invaded Cities Church during a service, verbally terrorizing parishioners and blocking exits, causing families to flee.

item.title: Trump Should Talk To Angel Parents Before He Takes ICE Out Of Minneapolis
item.description: The father of a woman killed by a drunk illegal alien says appeasing sanctuary mayors and violent radicals will make more victims.

item.title: Can the University of Austin Be Replicated?
item.description: Its slimmed-down finances could prove as significant as its curriculum.
